body:
Just pulled the new code about at about 5:50pm, 27 Feb, 2014. 

scripts/Arcane_Teachings.txt crashes me.



CRASH REPORT FOR MAGARENA THREAD Thread[main,5,main]
CREATED ON 2014/02/27 17:51:26
MAGARENA VERSION 1.48, JRE 1.7.0_51, OS Linux_3.2.0-59-generic-pae i386
================================
Used Memory: 40M
Free Memory: 205M
Total Memory: 245M
Max Memory: 455M
================================
-Xms256M
-Xmx512M


Exception from controller.runGame: Error loading /home/zen/code/merc/magarena/release/Magarena/scripts/Arcane_Teachings.txt
java.lang.RuntimeException: Error loading /home/zen/code/merc/magarena/release/Magarena/scripts/Arcane_Teachings.txt
	at magic.data.CardDefinitions.loadCardDefinition(CardDefinitions.java:140)
	at magic.data.CardDefinitions.loadCardDefinitions(CardDefinitions.java:162)
	at magic.MagicMain.initializeEngine(MagicMain.java:177)
	at magic.MagicMain.initialize(MagicMain.java:205)
	at magic.MagicMain.main(MagicMain.java:94)
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to convert cost {T}:SN deals 1 damage to target creature or player. to an ability
	at magic.model.MagicAbility.getAbilityRaw(MagicAbility.java:870)
	at magic.model.MagicAbility.get AbilityList (MagicAbility.java:879)
	at magic.data.CardProperty$18.setProperty(CardProperty.java:113)
	at magic.data.CardDefinitions.setProperty(CardDefinitions.java:71)
	at magic.data.CardDefinitions.prop2carddef(CardDefinitions.java:109)
	at magic.data.CardDefinitions.loadCardDefinition(CardDefinitions.java:136)
	... 4 more
author: [nicolai.tesela](https://code.google.com/u/nicolai.tesela/)
title: Arcane Teachings

Please rebuild the jar. The syntax for activated abilities has changed.

**Status:** WontFix

content:

Just pulled the new code about at about 5:50pm, 27 Feb, 2014.
